creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: bulbous body with thin neck with a disk shape at top of neck, spout applied on shoulder; stoneware with underglaze decoration in green and black; many bands accentuate and define areas of the shape creating fields which are filled with arabesque and leaf-and-vine motifs
medium: Sawankalok ware Stoneware with painted iron decor under a clear glaze
title: Kendi (Water Bottle)
